column2: This one's about color, and exploration. Give it a shot! It's part of the Terminal 2 Network, and you can launch it through the Pathways or the Desktop.
It's always interesting when people mash up art and games - It's quite relaxing to just sit back and recolor the world.

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that `White House` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play.

Click the icon named `More Apps` on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
